symptoms.name: Lymphadenopathy
symptoms.severity: Variable, ranging from pea-sized to 3x4 cm
symptoms.pattern: Generalized or localized; may involve cervical, tonsillar, intraparotid, axillary, and inguinal regions

symptoms.name: Erythematous rash
symptoms.pattern: May be present on lower extremities, associated with angiomatous nodules, vesicles, blisters, and purple papules

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.severity: Variable, may be significant enough to impair daily activities

physical_findings: Lymphoedema of the left lower limb
Palpable lymph nodes (various sizes and locations)

lab_values.hiv_viral_load: Variable, may be undetectable or elevated (35,400 copies/mL)
lab_values.cd4_count: Variable, may be decreased (29 cells/cubic millimeter)

risk_factors: Age (elderly men of Jewish and East European origin for classic KS)

imaging_findings.computed_tomography: Hypervascularized, partly necrotic lymphadenopathy; may involve cervical, thoracic, para-aortic, axillary, and inguinal regions
imaging_findings.doppler_ultrasound: Voluminous, richly vascularized lymphadenopathy with mass effect on adjacent vessels

required: Histopathological examination showing spindle-shaped cells, neoangiogenesis, inflammation, and edema in lymph node biopsy
supportive: Clinical presentation with lymphadenopathy, possibly with skin lesions
